eu.wauz.wauzcore.players.ui

Class WauzPlayerScoreboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.players.ui.WauzPlayerScoreboard

  • public class WauzPlayerScoreboard
extends java.lang.Object
    An UI class to show a player quests and the like in the sidebar, based on their current world.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WauzPlayerScoreboard()

      private static void addScoreboardTeams(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.scoreboard.Scoreboard scoreboard)
      Adds prefixes to the online players listed on the scoreboard, by creating new teams.
      private static java.util.List<java.lang.String> generateQuestObjectiveList(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, java.lang.String questMargin, java.lang.String questName, int questPhase, org.bukkit.ChatColor questColor)
      Generates a list of a quest and its objectives, to show in the sidebar.
      static void scheduleScoreboard(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Schedules a task to update the sidebar of the player, based on the world they are in.
      private static void scoreboardDungeon(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Shows a dungeon sidebar with the name and keys of the instance to a player.
      private static void scoreboardHub(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Shows a hub sidebar with the ip, aswell as their rank and tokens to a player.
      private static void scoreboardQuests(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Shows a quest sidebar with all running quests and their objectives to a player.
      private static void scoreboardSurvival(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Shows a survival sidebar with the ip, season, commands, aswell as their score and tokens to a player.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WauzPlayerScoreboard

        public WauzPlayerScoreboard()

    • Method Detail

      • scheduleScoreboard

        public static void scheduleScoreboard(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Schedules a task to update the sidebar of the player, based on the world they are in. The scoreboard will be refeshed in 0.5 seconds from then.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who should receive the scoreboard.
        See Also:
        scoreboardHub(Player), scoreboardDungeon(Player), scoreboardQuests(Player), scoreboardSurvival(Player)

      • scoreboardHub

        private static void scoreboardHub(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Shows a hub sidebar with the ip, aswell as their rank and tokens to a player. Also adds online player team prefixes to the scoreboard.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who should receive the scoreboard.
        See Also:
        addScoreboardTeams(Player, Scoreboard)

      • scoreboardSurvival

        private static void scoreboardSurvival(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Shows a survival sidebar with the ip, season, commands, aswell as their score and tokens to a player. Also adds online player team prefixes to the scoreboard.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who should receive the scoreboard.
        See Also:
        addScoreboardTeams(Player, Scoreboard)

      • scoreboardDungeon

        private static void scoreboardDungeon(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Shows a dungeon sidebar with the name and keys of the instance to a player. Also adds online player team prefixes to the scoreboard.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who should receive the scoreboard.
        See Also:
        addScoreboardTeams(Player, Scoreboard)

      • scoreboardQuests

        private static void scoreboardQuests(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Shows a quest sidebar with all running quests and their objectives to a player. Also adds online player team prefixes to the scoreboard.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who should receive the scoreboard.
        See Also:
        generateQuestObjectiveList(Player, String, String, int, ChatColor), addScoreboardTeams(Player, Scoreboard)

      • generateQuestObjectiveList

        private static java.util.List<java.lang.String> generateQuestObjectiveList(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                                                           java.lang.String questMargin,
                                                                           java.lang.String questName,
                                                                           int questPhase,
                                                                           org.bukkit.ChatColor questColor)
        Generates a list of a quest and its objectives, to show in the sidebar.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who is doing the quest.
        questMargin - The empty space above the title.
        questName - The name of the quest.
        questPhase - The phase of the quest.
        questColor - The color of the quest type.
        Returns:
        The list of quest objectives.

      • addScoreboardTeams

        private static void addScoreboardTeams(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                       org.bukkit.scoreboard.Scoreboard scoreboard)
        Adds prefixes to the online players listed on the scoreboard, by creating new teams. Following prefixes are possible, ordered by priority: GROUP, GUILD, ADMIN. There will be also a suffix added to each team, to show the player's health.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who should receive the scoreboard.
        scoreboard - The scoreboard that should receive the player teams.
